tasks.title: Add Parsinator Health Check
tasks.description: Create a simple endpoint to verify Parsinator functionality is working correctly in the web context.

tasks.title: Set Up Basic Logging
tasks.description: Implement logging for Parsinator operations to track usage and debug issues in web environment.

tasks.title: Create Comprehensive Test Suite
tasks.description: Develop automated tests covering all Parsinator web API endpoints, file upload scenarios, error cases, and integration with existing web functionality.

tasks.title: Write User Documentation
tasks.description: Create clear documentation for using Parsinator through the web interface including brief format guides, examples, troubleshooting, and feature explanations.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance for Large Briefs
tasks.description: Implement optimizations for processing large briefs, add progress indicators for long operations, and ensure responsive interface during processing.

tasks.title: Implement Production Error Handling
tasks.description: Add comprehensive error logging, user-friendly error messages, graceful failure handling, and proper cleanup of temporary files.

tasks.title: Complete Code Cleanup and Organization
tasks.description: Remove test files, organize static assets, add proper comments, and ensure consistent code style across all new components.

tasks.title: Add Input Validation and Sanitization
tasks.description: Implement robust validation for brief uploads, content sanitization, and security checks for file handling.

tasks.title: Create Integration Tests
tasks.description: Develop end-to-end tests that verify the complete workflow from brief input through task generation and export functionality.

metadata.description: Generated from 3 briefs (deployment, setup) using Parsinator task generation system
